website_summaries.verdict: Solid lineup of features, including a 20-volt battery, which is nice at this price.
pros: Smart Charge only charges when necessary, helping the battery work efficiently
The slim nozzle helps get into tight spaces
Charging light tells you when it is ready to use
Comes with a convenient charging base
cons: Many users tell us this model is louder than they like

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service department at Black and Decker
customer_reviews.text: Unit is not charging correctly. LED charge light is not coming on. Called Black and Decker support and they will not help repair or replace the product. Product has a 3 year warranty, and the unit is only 3 months old. Terrible customer service department at Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The majority of high reviewers for this product probably left their review after using the vacuum for only a few days or weeks. This mini vacuum died only after 3 months of light use. Theres a noxious odor coming from it that would indicate a complete motor failure, only after about 40 uses. Return policy isn't great either, I feel like I should be able to exchange my product for another since it died so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my SUV.  Be Careful Handling the Cone (top) Portion of the Unit
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nimble, and generally can handle the majority area of my SUV. Have to be careful when using in tight areas to not apply too much pressure when vacuuming or else the top will pop off. Keep in mind always protecting the top portion because sooner or later you will accidentally knock the unit off a table and the locking may break connecting both sides. When not in use, alway take the top portion off so that if I'm clumsy, nothing will break. Can easily get 1.5 uses per charge for the entire carpeted area of my Tahoe
customer_reviews.author: GS-Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought it to use for quick clean-ups especially around the kitchen area. Having 4 kids, the house can get messy really fast. This helps me tidy up real quick and the kids love using it too. The suction power is great and I love that it is handy that I can clean hard to reach areas that a regular floor vacuum cleaner can't get to like under the closet, pantry, couch, etc. The height is perfect too to put on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Works great at first...
customer_reviews.text: Works great (powerful suction) in the beginning but within 5 uses or so the suction is minimal.My sister experienced the same think with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charger problems
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product died on us after less than a year. The charger stopped charging the battery. Trying to get reimbursed. No luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Davide Panagia

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, high power
customer_reviews.text: Best tiny vacuum ever! I used my first one for 3 years straight, many times a day to clean up after my toddler, as well as clean inside my car. The motor started to die about 3.5 years in, so I bought a new one and it’s great. I got a lot of mileage out of this vacuum and that’s why I re-purchased it. You can take out the filter and wash it, let it dry and put it back in. No need to buy replacement filters if you are willing to clean the one it comes with. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Suction is weak. Keeps shutting off. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: Did not love it. Received the vacuum on Saturday morning. Went straight to the charger. First use was Sunday. Kept shutting down after 10 minutes of use. The suction is weak. Maybe mine was defective, or maybe it's just not a great handheld vacuum. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great little unit. I use it for car cleaning. My wife found it in my area of the house and has been using it to clean up grand kids cookie crumbs, lint on the carpet and whatever other supper small jobs around the house. Supper easy to clean. For the price it is great. If I did it again I would look at the little more pricey units that come with smaller attachments to get in the small detail areas for cleaning cars. For what it is, a good buy. I would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tim_l

customer_reviews.title: Love the 20 volts
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is quite powerful. LOVE THE 20 VOLTS. It has a double filter: one metal and one of fabric. The metal filter is on top of the fabric one. The metal filter has tiny holes and when I clean the filters after I vacuum cat litter from the floor, some of the cat litter gets stuck in some of these holes. I just clean the holes with a tooth brush from time to time. Nothing to worry too much about. I am glad I bought this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Zare

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised with this little tool in a good way!! Here's why - 1. It's lightweight, just what I needed. 2. Suction is good - I use it to clean up the corners, and my birds mess. 3. For me battery life has bot been an issue so far as other people mention - I have ised it for 30 mins on n off and it didn't give up on me. 4. You DON'T have to hold the button for it to work. 5. It does have a charging light. Cons - 1. Wish it came with a big mouth long attachment. 2. And I didn't have to replace the filters at all.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job picking up.
customer_reviews.text: This hand vacuum has strong suction and use it in both house and vehicles. The charging plate is a little odd to use at first but doesn't take long to get use to. The charging plate sits on the floor or a shelf and the vacuum sets upright on it to charge. This is not the unit for you if you want to hang it to charge. Get the square trade extended warranty . The switch started to go bad on my previous unit of this same vacuum just out of the two year factory warranty. Square trade fully reimbursed for what I paid for the previous unit, no hassle and I didn't even have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A powerful cordless vacuum with a nozzle that’s way too small & a very poorly designed charger
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of suction and very good run time per charge. However, -1 star for the nozzle that is small to the point that it is really useful only for crevices and corners. And -1 star for the truly lame proprietary charger that requires you to balance the vacuum precariously on a dust/dirt collecting charger plate that seems like it could give an electric shock to pets or children. I almost returned it to Amazon and now wish that I had because I never use it. Not recommended, especially for the outrageous price they’re now asking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum.  Does cat litter and cat hair perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Saves lugging the big vacuum out. Handy, battery is always charged and easy to do little spots without a lot of preparation. Just take off charger, run around the floor, chairs, cat's blanket, around litter box. just about everything including the car. Great gadget...actually better then a gadget, it works like it's supposed too.
customer_reviews.author: Herb J

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO LOUD, and a pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works great - but is difficult to clean. There's a hard plastic "net" that nestles directly against the dust filter, which makes it more challenging to clean than our previous dustbuster which just had the filter. THIS THING IS LOUD. I read some of the other reviews saying it was loud but I thought, "How loud can it be?" Well, it is loud enough so it is uncomfortable vacuuming with this due to the noise level. I won't buy a 20V vacuum again.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos/Angie

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cordless vacuum for my wife when she got a new car. She loves the car but was very disappointed by the vacuum. Every time she uses it you can see it shooting out dust from the back. We made sure the dust bowl was empty and the filters are in place, but it just doesn’t work correctly. It blows out a cloud of dust every time she turns it on. It is also very loud and worst of all, the suction is weak and it hardly picks up anything. Unfortunately the return window closed two weeks ago, so I guess I wasted my money. I don’t recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Product and Service EXCELLENCE!
customer_reviews.text: 6 months after purchasing we heard a strange rattle in the motor and the suction stopped. I was dreading having to get it repaired and did not want to give it up as it had become one of my very favorite appliances. My husband called Black and Decker, gave them the serial number and within minutes the kind woman from customer service said, "That should not have happened. We will have a new one shipped out to you by the end of the week." Sure enough, it arrived yesterday. Not only do I highly recommend the product I am totally impressed by their exemplary service.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Very Poorly Designed Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor design. I cannot find the wall mount bracket so apparently it is missing. The vacuum is somehow supposed to "balance" on the base. Obviously you cannot hang it up and charge it at the same time. Back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Montalguy

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not replaceable. Started to fail at a year and a half.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the vacuum works well. The filter gets clogged pretty quickly. It is washable however. My main issue with it is that after two years, the battery has failed and it is not replaceable. I have been getting progressively less run time over the last 6 months. If you are looking for something to last a little longer keep looking. I would not recommend this item. Look for something with a replaceable battery. Buying a new one today. It wont be a Black & Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My old Back and Decker battery was not holding charge. This new one has good suction and to recharge, you only have to set on charging plate. The old one you had to plug it into a cord to recharge, not a big problem, but it is simpler to just set it down on the charging plate.
customer_reviews.author: Ex Marine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased when I bought this - worked great and found the base to be very convenient for a quick grab and clean. At month 13, it stopped working correctly. Despite cleaning it thoroughly since purchase and no instances of the unit being dropped or damaged, it all of a sudden would tun off after running for only 15 seconds. It charges just fine, but it simply won’t work correctly. Bought it at discount and looks like a repair would cost the amount of the unit which just isn’t worth it. Don’t waste your money on this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: DeptM

customer_reviews.title: SPEECHLESS
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on somewhat below par review not expecting too much from these cordless vacuum cleaner. Boy, was i fooled. At below US $60 discounted for prime customers, I'll put these in my top 5 most surprisingly good item per review on Amazon. Extremely portable, above average sunction and highly functional, i am more than pleased. It vacuumed my sparingly used SUV well. Highly Highly recommended at $59.99.
customer_reviews.author: yanjumoye

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface by saying I probably just got a bad unit. I like the design, the charger is cool. Mine doesn’t have a lot of suction, and when I’ve used it, you can see it shooting out white dust from the back, like dust is going right through the filter. I took it apart, I have the filters that are supposed to be in there, but it just doesn’t work correctly. I would have returned it, but I already threw away the packaging and it’s not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Black&Decker, Hand Held Vacuum's (from Amazon?)
customer_reviews.text: Bought 20V, Black unit, BDH2000L, Nov/2017, from Amazon. Within short time it started howling / shrieking when used. Unbearable. Bought new filters from Amazon and cleaned unit regularly. Even if not needed, thinking that's the problem. Bought two, 16V Blue units, CHV1410L, July/2015 from Amazon and the same results occurred in a short time. Not THINKING, I went and bought the aforementioned 20V Black unit. Only because I got tired of taking out and using my regular SEARS vacuum. (bought from SEAR's). I will THINK before I buy another Black and Decker item from Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Caloras

customer_reviews.title: DINT WASTE YOUR TIME!  ALL THE ITHER REVIEWS ARE CRAZY. GET A SHARK
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is made poorly. The section was horrible even after charging it all day. The nozzle pulls out for a longer reach but as soon as it snags on anything or if you hit a chair-leg it retracts. The fold down brush well nice and design is horrible for practical use such as vacuuming a couch with a back-and-forth motion. The brush just collapses back. It is also quite difficult to turn the vacuum nozzle as pictured and it is also a pain to empty debris container. I returned it and got the shark handheld pet vac. It is super powerful and amazing
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Allen

customer_reviews.title: 20V Lithium Power is Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a variety of hand held rechargeable vacs over the years and none begin to compare with this model. The suction is excellent on both hard and carpeted surfaces. I like these enough to have 2; one for each level of the house. Battery life is also excellent. I’ve had my first one several years and as long as I keep it reasonably clean, there has never been any loss of suction or lessening of battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: SO. FREAKING. LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a nice unit and works well but it's so mind-numbingly loud I couldn't keep it on long enough to use it. Also made my toddler in another room cry and I only had it on for about 2-3 seconds. Will be returning, even though it'll apparently cost me almost $9 to do so.
customer_reviews.author: C.Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lazy days and corners!
customer_reviews.text: Since I got a dog with a double coat, this has been a lifesaver whenever I see some hair stuck in corners. I hate using our large vacuum more than once a week, so between the roomba and this small handy tool our floor is kept really clean, even during shedding season. I also used it to vacuum my car and got through the backseats and the passenger seat before it ran out of battery, and my car was NOT clean at all when I started, so I think the battery lasts a good 15-20 minutes on a full charge. This has got to be one of my best purchases this year!
customer_reviews.author: DragonCeres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for a similar unit that was purchased 6.5 years ago and had a motor failure. We used the old unit extensively as we have 3 dogs (lots of pet hair and dirt from feet) and during the summer months we used it to vacuum up mosquitoes rather than use a fly swatter (works wonderfully and you don’t have to clean up the walls). Definitely deserves at least 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases ever. I cannot tell you how many hand vacs I have purchased, only to have the suction give out or experience some other problem (one spit out all that I had vacuumed when finished!). This is a winner. I simply keep it on its charger when not in use, and it is always ready. Great suction that lasts long enough for me to do all of my rooms.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is next to useless.
customer_reviews.text: This machine sounds and acts like my old 16 volt Black & Decker Hand Vac did after I dropped it on the concrete floor. Which is I why ordered a 20 volt it was an upgrade and I needed one, I loved the 16 volt I had. But, alas, this was not to be. This machine whines, as my old one did after I dropped it. So I know something is either defective or it too was dropped somewhere between factory, warehouse and here.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: SMOKE cams out of the engine , made super Cheap !!!
customer_reviews.text: Build cheap & very load . This was my second one , and will be the last one from Black & Decker !! They change the engine to one that is lighter weight But super load . My dogs get traumatize anytime I turn it on . The first one , the battery died after few month . The second vacuum , 11 month after ( not on a daily use ) .. smoke came out of the engine / dead vacuum.. not safe not recommended at all .. can’t believe they actually design and sale something so cheaply build ...
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: This Vacumn Cleaner Really Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: ...But I mean that in a good way. It's the most powerful hand-held I ever owned. It really does the job. I just hope it lasts longer than the cheaper ones I bought in the past. I like the "stand-up" charging stand too; no more trying to fit the charging nodes into the "slots". This makes it easy to pick up too; no bending over. My wife uses it more than I do!
customer_reviews.author: Ferd Berfel

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT replacement for our old "Dust Buster! Powerful, not too noisy at all. We love the built in extendable nozzle and flip out brush. And the LION battery is great, as the Mrs. never quite understood why you had to drain the old NiCad's down so the didn't get a memory. Now she can place it back on the charger after every use, and it's always topped off and ready to go. We're buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Lord Sebastian Esq

customer_reviews.title: Love it but its a bit loud!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum! Very good suction power & easily vacuums in small & large areas! Its also very handy to clean cars too! The only draw back is that it is loud & has a high pitched whine. Im going to try to muffle it somehow. The only reason im giving it 4 out of 5 stars is that it is loud. Other than that it is a great vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: LoveJoyLove

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suction!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum for my car and it does an awesome job. The slender nozzle attachment gets in between my seats and the car frame very well. The suction is fanTAStic and I am truly impressed. I have not had this for very long, but so far it is great. The charger is a little strange and I have to really make sure that the vacuum is securely on the base, but other than that, I couldn’t love it more.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous101

customer_reviews.title: Sure not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this primarily to clean the carpets in the car. Thought one of the reviews said it would fit between the side and the seat. Unfortunately not in my car. I take my dog along with me quite often and find the suction is not strong enough for dog hair. The little brush on the end of the nozzle is just a,problem, as it is on a swivel and is not always where you want it when you want it there. It pops up after you put it down and pops down if something gets too close. Or it just pops off. I guess I'll just use it around the house
customer_reviews.author: rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Never expected to like this as much as I do!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Love this thing! I actually vacuum more because it is so convenient. Strong suction. Easy to empty. Almost got the Dyson Trigger, but saw the good reviews for this at one third the price. Glad I stuck with this one. Having the crevice tool and brush head built in makes it even better. Weird to wax rhapsodic over a dustbuster, but there you go. This is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction for a hand held
customer_reviews.text: I wore the forst one out after about 4 years, so this is a replacement. Price is right and it does have really good suction. Very high DB (like jet noise), though, so you might want to wear ear plugs when you use it. Take an old sock, cut 4, 4/2 inches back from the toe and insert that over the filter. Makes it last a lot longe and you're mostly just cleaning that sock each time you go outside and clean it out. Beat the sock against a tree (or anything) and it comes clean. don't vacuum water!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Think before buying this model
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cordless. Bought in nov, and now it’s february and it won’t power on for more than 10-15 seconds. Regularly cleaned, no clogs. Of course the return expiration was Jan 31st and the “talk to an expert” option on the website expired mid feb, so I’m stuck buying a new one. The 16v cordless I bought was great and still going strong a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L. Frith

customer_reviews.title: Powerful handheld
customer_reviews.text: This is a great handheld vacuum. It is kept on its base so it's always fully charged and runs great. It has great suction power. I like that the nozzle can be extended to get a slimmer profile for getting into nooks and crannies without having to change it out and lose pieces. It is easy to clean out when full as well.
customer_reviews.author: SoCoEnvy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  No wall bracket but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this only for a few days and it is really nice. Please note that this does not come with a wall mount bracket. The instructions in the box mentions the bracket it but it is not for this model. I contacted Black and Decker and they told me the following "I apologize for any inconvenience. The BDH2000L does not have wall mounting bracket. The BDH2010LP does." Other than that it works fine. The seller was awesome with quick service.
customer_reviews.author: Kubitt

customer_reviews.title: Suction power is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with its suction power. I use it exclusively for my cars. It makes all my other Black and Decker hand vacuums passe (I buy one every year, always looking for a new model with exceptional suction power). Now I have it. I haven't used it so much as 11 months out of the year I work overseas, so I cannot comment on durability. It should be good with Black and Deckers name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Leon J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, INSANELY noisy
customer_reviews.text: Just got this vacuum and so far it has been great! It has good suction and the charging aspect is convenient and it can be left on the base. I also like the fact that the extension and brush are attached to the vacuum. What I don’t like, however, is the INSANELY loud noise it makes. It is VERY loud and also makes a whistling noise while operating. So know what you’re getting into.
customer_reviews.author: Sourabh

customer_reviews.title: I just love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I just love this unit....it is a tad on the loud side but that's about the only negative thing I can say about it. It is a cinch to empty and clean filters, has great suction, on-board attachments that you cant lose, extendable nozzle that locks into place. The charging base can be a little better in the way it docks with the unit but I don't find that to be a deal breaker in the least. So far I've run it for 10 minutes straight with no loss of power whatsoever. With a two year warranty you really can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Gets in small spaces, has great suction power
customer_reviews.text: This is very powerful, it lasts long without recharge, but I hate cleaning the filters. Wish I could open the hatch & smash it inside my garbage can (like I do with my vacuum chamber!) Everything sticks to the filters & it's a pain to clean them off. That said, this vacuum gets in small spaces (thanks to the long narrow head) & has the best suction power. I went with this lithium battery option because it is supposed to be better/ last longer. Although I had the $30 version of this vacuum preciously for many years - it worked great & took quite a bit of abuse. I can't be without one of these now for quick clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction. Sub par hepa filter.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall Dustbuster vac. Strong suction , long battery. The only thing I don’t like is the hepa filter in this model. The last model had a much better hepa filter. The filter in this model gets full /saturated too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 3 years. Month after 3 year warranty ends it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 3 years. Month after 3 year warranty ends it breaks. My mom loved it and I have another one at home. They work well and vacuum well, hold charge well, and are easy to clean. But sad that our 3 year old one is broken and my other one that is 1 year old may break soon too..
customer_reviews.author: Valeriy Kortchak

customer_reviews.title: Cool Charging Station
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a birthday present back in February 2018. We actually both use it a lot now, but mostly him. Great for cleaning up saw dust or dirt from all his projects and for cleaning the car. The suction is good and the battery lasts long enough for us. The charging stand I was initially worried about breaking or it being too flimsy, but its actually really convenient to be able to just place the vacuum on the stand rather than having to plug in a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian L.

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years even less than 2 years battery became dead.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand vacuum.. I bought this 2 years back.. It was good. I don’t know what happened to this now after a full day charge it not working even for 2 minuets..
customer_reviews.author: Sona

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, easy to clean, but the battery life only lasts about 20 min before it needs to be charged again. I expected way longer battery life for the price. It's also extremely high pitched and louder than most vacuums I've owned. I can deal with that, it's just the battery life that is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Beelzebub666

customer_reviews.title: Strong and lightweight but with small nozzle opening, small dust bin, and battery that quits with little warning.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and powerful with built-in brush attachment. Lightweight. Fast charging with unique charging base. It is loud, as you would expect from 20 volts. Suction is good but the opening is smaller than older DustBusters so its hard to compare. The basin appears smaller than older versions and the nozzle can be difficult to get to clip back in place. Also when the battery is weak it just stops -- older versions would whine so you knew when to finish up and charge it.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Performs quite well !
customer_reviews.text: Beats the dyson handheld, which I returned to Costco for a refund. I had the 16volt as well, but the battery got weaker and weaker, just did not hold the charge well after a while. This one is a good performer, and I do not leave it on charge. I'll only put it on the charger when it needs it ! I'm quite happy with how it performs and holds a charge ! This will likely be my last handheld I'll ever need !
customer_reviews.author: ColdShot

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Design
customer_reviews.text: I usually am unimpressed with Black+Decker. Their power tools have not impressed me over the years. But they got the design on this vacuum right. Great form, weight and feel. Fantastic suction, the battery just keeps going, and very easy to clean. Nozzle extends to get into tight spots, and retracts easily for normal cleanup. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dustbuster, so strong and cleans well. a little loud but its not too bad. The thing I don't like is that it sits on the charger in a manner that anything can easily knock it over. It is not wall mountable or sturdy. You have to put it somewhere that is out of reach of pets and kids especially.
customer_reviews.author: Hanneh J. Kalyoussef

customer_reviews.title: love the suction on this model
customer_reviews.text: I use this dust buster daily, I have a dog who sheds constantly, and this is perfect for picking up on hard floors. I love the portability. 4 stars for durability, because occasionally the nozzle comes off the base, spilling the contents. Battery life seems fine, I can carry it around the house and use it intermittently for several minutes at a time and return it to its base. Also works well to vacuum my car
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I basically had the old version with a different battery in it, and it worked great but the battery died. This has been a good replacement. The battery lasts much longer, charges quickly, and has great suction power. It does a great job picking up cat hair, and is great in the car. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in CT

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this roughly a year ago and just realized I haven't used it in like 6 months. Was purchased exclusively for cat liter spots that escape the litter box. Every time I use this thing it spits the litter back out the front nozzle everywhere. I keep it empty and clean it, plus fully charged. Nothing seems to fix this issue. Just writing it as a loss and moving on 2 stars because it seemed to work well for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bug vac
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum suction is strong! I use it to vac up un-invited creepy crawlies. There is a little door at the end of the vac extension that I thought would be useful to keep bugs from crawling back out of the vac, but it rarely stays closed. There is a gap between the vac extension and the dust catcher, which seems to prevent anything from crawling back out.
customer_reviews.author: ascendr

customer_reviews.title: Nice handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: In general, these handheld vacuums don't tend to last more than a few years. This is our third one (?) in about 25 years. I am pleased with the suction of this one. It's a little heavy for me, but I'm a weakling, so it's fine for normal people.
customer_reviews.author: Mumzie

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my entire house!
customer_reviews.text: Our house is tile and hardwood and this has literally replaced my full sized vacuum. Very powerful and the extension wand is helpful. Only wish you could be an even longer wand to use fully standing up. The battery lasts just long enough to do the entire house which is 1,400 sq ft. or about 15 minutes of non stop use.
customer_reviews.author: DTMPowerM5

customer_reviews.title: Disposable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Unit no longer holds a charge after a year or so. We were happy with it for the first year, but after that it really started to fail. Even after charging overnight, the time it would work was continually decreasing. Now we're at about 5 seconds before the battery is dead. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: SD91932

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. really light .. compared to older version I had that tired my wrist out sometimes but this one I LOVE how it is lightweight! Easy to maneuver and clean. REALLY fast charging and I just love the look, sleek and black. But also because of the size you can just tuck it away in a corner under your desk or something, out of sight if you wanted, while it’s charging and use it when you need to. The suction is AMAzing and works really well for dust and even for like spilled dog food or something it sucks it right up .
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: 20-Volt Max Lithium Ion Battery - Bamm! This baby has power.
customer_reviews.text: We love the power and the long pull out nozzle. This hand vacuum has more power that our last one. I highly recommend the Black + Decker BDH2000L 20 Volt Max Lithium Ion Battery Cordless Hand Vacuum. A hand vac is an absolute must in our home. I'm always pulling it out for a quick pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Zel B

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this product. After having it for less than a year now I’m about ready to toss it. The vacuum is obnoxiously loud and has this almost shrill sound to it. I’m not sure if maybe I got a faulty product or not but something about it doesn’t seem right. The suctioning capabilities are subpar as well. Every time I vacuum I have to scoop the nose upwards or else dust and other materials fall out. I dump the filter after every use as well but that still doesn’t help. It really bums me out that I invested a good chunk of money into something just really isn’t worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. It would not fully charge so I would only get a few minutes use before I would have to recharge it. Now it stopped charging completely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the charging position
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has good suction and I have no complaints with it. My problem is the way in which it charges. The unit sits in the charger straight up and takes up a lot of room and prohibits it from storing on my shelf. My previous machines charged laying flat and I found this much easier and more space efficient. Also my unit was received without the wall hanging piece. Since I just received it I have not tested it over time but as I mentioned it does have good suction and this is primarily why we buy it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Fields

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO LOUD
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is pretty good, but I honestly dread using it. I purchased this because of all the good reviews about the suction strength hoping it would replace the need to drag out my full sized Dyson. It works, but this little thing manages to be TWICE AS LOUD as my full sized push vacume to the point where I wish I could return it. Im not usually sensitive to these things, but its very jarring. Would not recomend if you have pets or small children.
customer_reviews.author: Lotty

customer_reviews.title: B & D 20 V.  hand vac. a super star, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I like the dustbuster very much, except it is a little hard to empty the refuse out of the holding tank, because of the way the tank is designed. Otherwise, it is great at it has lots of power and battery life. How well it will last over the years is hard to predict. I have only had it for a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Acton

customer_reviews.title: Wear earplugs!
customer_reviews.text: If this could keep the same suction power while being a little less loud it would be perfect. I read the reviews about it coming apart while in use, and there are two switches close together. One is the power, the other is the latch for the front portion and it takes a few uses to become sufficiently familiar with them that one only presses the power unless wanting to empty the unit. What an improvement over the old handhelds this is. I agree that the brush is reasonably useless, but it is handy to have at times if some lint is stubborn and one can't be bothered to bend over further.
customer_reviews.author: Skeinjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and 3 cats plus we shed when we dry or flat iron our hair in the bathroom. Works well! I have one upstairs and one downstairs. Works great for small jobs or even to go through the house in between vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: KEKEE

customer_reviews.title: What Can I Say that Others Have Not - but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in January 2017 from Amazon. It worked pretty good until it didn't Easy to clean and maintain but even more so when it quit working. No power, no juice, it died on the charging station. Oh poor Orick, why hath ye done this to me. The Two stars are an average for when it worked and as it is now. Not even a good door stop.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Wells

customer_reviews.title: USE YOUR OLD HOOK FROM YOUR LAST BLACK AND DECKER to be able to keep this vac on wall
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. ..but I TOTALLY understand the repeated gripe of the charging dock situation.......I was tired of buying a new dust buster ever 6months to a year due to the crappy battery always going bad....I HAD to go with a lithium battery this time, prob was the new ones you cant hang on wall and charge....How DUMB is that!?! The stand up method was wobbly! But guess what? I kept the hook on the wall the old one fit on and thus one fits! I just lay the charging base across the top and WALLA
customer_reviews.author: Jaspurcat

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little Vac It has alot of power behind it, it charges relatively quick, and it has some pretty nice features. Swivel, extension, built in brush. and easy dump & clean housing. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: My new housekeeping buddy
customer_reviews.text: charges up nicely and fits right in the corner. I have 3 dogs and I use it for their hair balls and corners of the house. This is great for the stairs in the house, instead of using the broom or a large vacuum with a hose I just grab and clean as I go up the stairs and return to the charging dock when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Suction is weak
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't last that long - not enough to vaccum my car twice. It's loud but doesn't suck well. I had bought another black and decker before this, and the battery didn't last for one car vacum. I guess Black and Decker is not that great. ? For the price of it, I would suggest trying a different brand or use the old school electric one if possible.
customer_reviews.author: BT SJ

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in 5 years, and I think it’s a great design and build. Original one still works and holds a good charge butter motor started getting a bit loud ,so I took it down to my boat. But been going strong for 2 years like this. I use them for everything sometimes even small wet messes and spills. Bit harder to clean out filter is all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all 20v are the same
customer_reviews.text: I focused on the 20v battery. This had no more suction than the 16v. Spend an extra 20 bucks and get their newest model with twice the suction power.
customer_reviews.author: tyler g peoples

customer_reviews.title: Very good hand held vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very good hand held vacuum. It has great suction and is good for vacuuming your car. It is also very handy in the house for cleaning up around kitchen cabinets or anywhere there is small debris. The battery seems to last a long time between charges. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON SELLING GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. It was a waste of time and money. Why AMAZON would sale garbage?. The Philipines' customer service wanted to troubleshoot the machine. Then they realized they cannot troubleshoot a vacuum. After 45 min realize they have to refund. Sadly Amazon is not what it used to be. This is the second order with the same issue. BE AWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Costumer

customer_reviews.title: Really sucks good. Seriously underrated
customer_reviews.text: Sucks up my huskys dog hair from the carpet really good. Pretty long run time. this little vac is seriously underrated. U won't regret buying this one. I researched these vacs for a while before deciding on this one. Ask my husky, she will tell u the same thing. UPDATE 2 years now and still going strong. Don't know why others are having problems.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Avalino

customer_reviews.title: :-) Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. I use it several times a week for the last 4 months and it is still going strong. Comes apart easily for clean up. good suction. I loves the little flip up brush on the end. It is nice to not have to search for the brush attachment when you need it for a little spot.
customer_reviews.author: Julie :-)

customer_reviews.title: Not good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product almost a month back and have used this almost every weekend. It has good suction power and extracts a lot of dust from your home. It is cordless and you feel comfortable while taking this from one place another while you clean in your home. But one big problem is its battery life which gets drained in 20-25 minutes and takes a lot of time to get charged. Sometimes, it does not even allow me to finish the cleaning of the big carpet that I have. It is advisable to think about the other available options before you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Good Vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these but it broke. I'm glad I also purchased the extended warranty too. I returned it and was sent a replacement very quickly. I'm happy with the purchase. It's a good vac. No problems at all putting it into charger like other reviews. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelAnn

customer_reviews.title: The charging stand makes this vacuum a pleasure to grab and replace after a cleanup
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has more staying power than the newer models and is easy to clean. The best part is the charging stand. When I need to do a quick spot vacuum, no more fighting with a cord. I just grab the vac and go. I would recommend getting more filters while you still can. They can be cleaned and last a very long time, but it's always better to have clean spares on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: other than that the battery life and strength works great,.
customer_reviews.text: only reason for 3 stars is because of the opening where suction is...its Tiny....this is only for tiny little spot pick-ups....other than that the battery life and strength works great,..i also like how light it is.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousJess

customer_reviews.title: My second cordless hand vac by Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying the "extended warranty" as the battery is only set to last about 2 years anyway. This vac is MUCH stronger than the first B&D vac I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: What an upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Go ahead and spend the money on this. My wife is so happy as we had been through half a dozen of the lesser models. We have turned them into warranty because the charge did not last. She loves this one!
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I find it very difficult to clean it after it gets full. I dont feel like it ever really gets clean. It is also hard to put back together after cleaning. I have a hard time keeping the nose for always "popping off" now. Just seems cheaply made for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl wilson

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! Do yourself a favor when buying a Dust Buster or similar clone - Pay a little more for 20v power strength. You’ll be glad you did. The auction on this one is really solid!
customer_reviews.author: John Wolk

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't charge after two years and maybe 50 uses.  DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This has a very low quality battery. I bought it in July '17 and by April '20 it had maybe 30 seconds of power on a complete charge. I've used it maybe 50 times in its life. Battery degradation this severe indicates very low quality batteries. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: ScaredinFL

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to have pretty impressive suction during first use
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to have pretty impressive suction during first use, but lost almost all power after 10 days. Suction became weak to non-existent. Cleaning the filters and everything else didn't help, so it's definitely product quality issue EDIT: Received replacement from Amazon and have been using it for several months now - works well. First one must have been defective. Changing to 4 stars - very solid portable vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Serge N.

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job! We are under a constant barrage of ...
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job! We are under a constant barrage of lovely blond hair from our Golden Retriever, and this is the very best solution we have found.
customer_reviews.author: Patti A

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: It kept dying after a few seconds. I would turn it on and it would start but then it would die. Not a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The battery died after 2 years of limited usage. Do not buy - must be better vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: extension does not stay locked.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star rating bu the extension does not stay locked into place. You try to use it in tight spots and it pops out. Not sure if it is just mine or all of them. Big reason for purchase was to use in the cracks of my seats of the car when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Crallfish

customer_reviews.title: 5 yrs. and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hand vacuum on a regular basis for 5 yrs. (May 2015 to be exact). It has it's usual hand vac limitations, but since I got a deal on replacement filters, I decided to take the 5 year old to work and by a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: A great handheld vacuum. Super powerful and easy to clean out. I originally purchased the 16V version several years a go. This a nice, noticeably more powerful upgrade. It holds it's charge for a quite awhile too. Great for small jobs. Usually use to suck up liter from around our cat's litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: fjd

customer_reviews.title: Its a monster
customer_reviews.text: Had one years ago and its still going. This one had even more horsepower. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Two degrees off

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is my new best friend. I use it on literally everything. It’s allowed me to clean up small dirt and particles from small crevices I’ve always just had to turn a blind eye to! I use it in the car, after my 5 year old eats to clean up crumbs around the table, and on the sofas! Suction is great and it’s small enough so it can just chill on the kitchen countertop ready for duty at any time! I don’t know how I’ve survived 29 years without this.
customer_reviews.author: Damian'smommy

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER dustbuster Handheld Vacuum, Cordless, Black (BDH2000L)
product_meta.description: Style Name:20V Hand VacuumBlack and Decker BDH2000L The sleek BDH2000L vacuum features a rotating slim nozzle with a built in crevice tool and flip up brush and is ideal for everyday cleanup of dust, pet hair and crumbs. The triple layer, cyclonic action filtration system helps keep dirt off the filter so users can blast through large messes with long lasting suction power. With its stylish design and washable filter and bowl, users can confidently display this vacuum in their living or dining room, keeping cleaning power handy when and where they need it most. The unit empties in one, mess free step and comes with a charging base, charge indicator light, and weighs less than three pounds. Cyclonic Action Helps keep the filter clean and power strong Translucent Dirt Canister Is easy to see dirt and simple to empty Rotating Slim Nozzle Ideal for clean up of dust, pet hair and crumbs from tight spaces Removable, Washable Bowl and Filter Simply rinse under running water Features Long Life Lithium Technology. Compact & lightweight. Always ready for use holds a charge for up to 18 months Smart Charge, only charges when necessary No memory effect for long battery life; year after year Rotating slim nozzle for a variety of applications Cyclonic action helps to keep the filter clean and power strong Always handy flip up brush and extendable crevice tools 3 year warranty Translucent bag less dirt bowl is easy to see dirt and empty Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a work load) is 20 volts. Nominal voltage is 18 volts. Applications Quick Clean Ups around the house Excellent for carpets, hard surfaces, stairs and more Black and Decker Platinum Vacuum Product Comparison Good Better Best 20V Max Lithium Ion Flex Vac 20V Max Lithium Ion Slide Pack Vac 20V Max Lithium Ion Cordless Hand Vac Black and Decker Platinum Features Pet Hair Removal Reach and
feature_bullets: Lithium Integral Batteries. Uses 20% less energy
Constant Voltage. Portable and ultra compact
Charge Duration: 4 Hrs. No Memory Effect.Suction Power:16.2 AW
Included Components: (1) BDH2000L hand vacuum, (1) VF110 washable filter, (1) Charging base, (1) On board crevice tool, (1) On board brush tool; Power Source: Cordless
Please refer user guide below for better use
Cyclonic action helps to keep the filter clean and power strong
Ready indicator light signals when fully charged
Removable, washable bowl and filter simply rinse under running water
Less bending with on board extension
Translucent dirt bowl easy to see dirt and easy to empty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,881 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Black & Decker Bdh2000L 20-Volt Max Lithium Ion Cordless Hand Vacuum, Lithium Integral Batteries, Replacement Filter Vf110
